General.Name: Seapeak LLC
General.Description: Seapeak LLC provides marine transportation services focusing on liquefied natural gas (LNG) and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) worldwide. It operates through two segments, LNG and LPG. It operates a fleet of 47 LNG carriers, 33 LPG, and 10 multi-gas carriers. The company was formerly known as Teekay LNG Partners L.P. and changed its name to Seapeak LLC on February 25, 2022. Seapeak LLC was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 550 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2K2
